data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Kâmpóng Chhnang to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary: On average, 37 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Lord, to the people of Kâmpóng Chhnang you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kraol people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kraol people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kraol people is yours.
Father, we pray that the people of Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kâmpóng Chhnang, Cambodia. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
